remarks: One need only check prime divisors of ` P ` up to ` sqrt P ` in order to ensure primality.  This version of ~ isprm5 combines the primality and bound on ` z ` into a finite interval of prime numbers.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)
statement:
isprm7 $p |- ( P e. Prime <-> ( P e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ A. z e. ( ( 2 ... ( |_ ` ( sqrt ` P ) ) ) i^i Prime ) -. z || P ) ) $.
$d P z $.
